publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2057 John Swinney: Investment in Scottish Infrastructure—That the Parliament notes the publication of Taking Forward the Scottish Futures Trust and the £14 billion of infrastructure investment set out in the Scottish Government’s Infrastructure Investment Plan; believes that it is important to ensure maximum value for the public purse from infrastructure investment and welcomes efforts to deliver better value, and further notes that 14 possible options for work to be carried out under the umbrella of the Scottish Futures Trust were identified and will be the subject of further development before being brought back to the Parliament. Supported by: Jim Mather*
